message: Hello Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. How about we settle at $13,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $11,500?
